Sentencas: Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 (x approximate to 0.4) was prepared by an ultrasound-driven technique at nanoscale.
Titulo: Development of Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposites for further application in a solid oxide fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: Physical morphology was characterised using XRD, TEM, BET and SEM-EDS, and its activity was tested in a fixed bed reactor at two different ratios of CH4/O-2.
Titulo: Development of Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposites for further application in a solid oxide fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: A 79.6% CO selectivity and a 54.7% CH4 conversion were obtained at a low CH4/O-2 ratio; however, at higher CH4/O-2 ratios, the selectivity of C-2 became significant.
Titulo: Development of Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposites for further application in a solid oxide fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: With the presence of Au, the CH4 conversion, H-2 yield and C-2 and CO selectivity were improved.
Titulo: Development of Au/La1-xSrxMnO3 nanocomposites for further application in a solid oxide fuel cell type reactor
